DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect emulsification lipid droplet size gastric empty rate , determine change gastric empty rate turn influence postprandial glycemic , insulinemic lipidemic response .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Emulsification Lipid Droplet Size Postprandial Metabolic Responses
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct use randomize , crossover design three dietary phase : 1 ) fine emulsion beverage ( small lipid droplet size ) , 2 ) coarse emulsion beverage ( large lipid droplet size ) 3 ) non-emulsified oil water . All treatment consume together bread . All participant randomly allocate three test meal . Fifteen twenty participant age 21 50 year recruit general public Singapore . During test session , participant ' glycemic , insulinemic , lipidemic response gastric empty test meal measure . Gastric antral distention ultrasound measurement indirect measure gastric empty rate . Participants ' metabolic satiety test meal also assess regular interval throughout test session . Each test session take approximately four hour duration test session take place least five day apart .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Chinese male subject age 21 50 year Body mass index 20.0 24.9 kg/m2 Normal blood pressure ( < 140/90 mmHg ) Fasting blood glucose < 6.0 mmol/L People major chronic disease heart disease , cancer diabetes mellitus People family history diabetes familial cholesterolaemic People history liver renal problem People intolerance allergy test product Individuals take insulin drug know affect glucose metabolism body fat distribution People major medical surgical event require hospitalization within precede three month Individuals presence disease drug influence digestion absorption nutrient
